atk-abh03a10:2_0: 269. Idāni brahmacariyakathā hoti. Tattha dve brahmacariyavāsā, maggabhāvanā ca pabbajjā ca. Pabbajjā sabbadevesu natthi.
atk-abh03a10:2_2: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti seyyathāpi sammitiyā,
atk-abh03a10:2_3: te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a10:2_4: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṁse. Katamehi tīhi?
atk-abh03a10:2_6: 9.21) idaṁ suttaṁ nissāya dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_7: Puna dvinnampi brahmacariyānaṁ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_8: Tattha hatthasaṁvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro.
atk-abh03a10:2_11: Paṭiññāya adhippāyaṁ asallakkhetvā pabbajjāvasena anuyogo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:3_0: 270.Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṁ maggapaṭilābhaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:3_1: Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:3_3: Puna ‘‘atthi devesū’’ti pañhepi maggabhāvanaṁ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a10:5_0: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā, atthi vā so padeso,
atk-abh03a10:5_1: yattha atthīti evaṁ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṁ sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:6_1: Suttānuyoge kuhiṁ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:7_1: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh03a10:9_1: Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti,
atk-abh03a10:9_2: sotāpannādīnampi siyāti etamatthaṁ dassetuṁ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṁ saṁsandanapucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:9_5: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a10:9_6: So idha anāgāmimaggaṁ bhāvetvā ‘‘opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī’’ti vacanato ‘‘puna maggabhāvanaṁ vinā upapattivaseneva arahattaphalaṁ sacchikarotī’’ti tassa laddhi.
atk-abh03a10:9_7: Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṁ bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṁ idhāgamanaññeva natthi.
atk-abh03a10:9_8: Iti so anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyaṁ puṭṭho paṭijānāti. Itaresaṁ paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:10_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe ‘‘anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva natthī’’ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati. Maggo ca bhāvīyati,
atk-abh03a10:10_1: na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā sakavādissa ,
atk-abh03a10:10_3: Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma jāto.
atk-abh03a10:11_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe ‘‘opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī’’ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a10:11_1: Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato vaseneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:12_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṁ vaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a10:12_1: Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena tassa akuppapaṭivedhaṁ icchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:13_0: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṁ udāharaṇaṁ paravādissa, dutiyaṁ sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:16_1: Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṁ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṁ icchanti seyyathāpi etarahi sammitiyādayo,
atk-abh03a10:16_2: tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna anuyogo sakavādissa,
